content: Does anyone have a copy of Betti and Power's 1988 paper "On local adjointness of distributive bicategories" they could share with me? I found a digital archive of the journal, but it does not include 1988. I emailed the authors, but Power does not have a copy, and Betti has not responded so far.
(I have just now received an email from Betti with a copy of the paper. I will upload it somewhere for others to read soon.)
Nathanael Arkor has marked this topic as resolved.
I would love to read this, if you can share the link.
